attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
instead of testing drugs/chemicals on animals, why not crimanals? 
these would be low risk drugs and appropriate mesures would have to be taken for medical officers safty, but would save cumpanies wanting to test drugs etc money and would surve as an added diturent to criminals, as well as providing them a use for the rest of sociaty. Also farmisutical companies testing on animals could also make the move but this would be the subject of a differant partition.
